## Update tidytuesday duckdb database



```{r setup}
library(DBI)
library(duckdb)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
drv <- duckdb()
con <- dbConnect(drv,"../DATA/tidytuesday.duckdb")
```
```{r}
owid_energy <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-06-06/owid-energy.csv') %>% clean_names() %>% remove_empty(which = c("rows", "cols"))

```

```{r}
dbWriteTable(db,"owid_energy",owid_energy,overwrite=TRUE)
dbGetQuery(con,"DESCRIBE bikedata")
```

```{r}
bike
```
